title: A lot of good memories
text: The best place to get souvenirs because of its good price and large assortiment. Nice arcitecture as well. If you plan to visit Plaka, visit Anafiotika as well, because it is near, we really recommend it! If you like to walk around tight streets, you would love it.

title: One of the cosiest place in the world
text: As we were walking around Acropolis, we didn't want to leave. We even walked around Acropolis again and again. We felt like home, even if there were a lot of people with us. And we had a really nice surprise that the entrance for european students is free

title: Best breakfast!
text: We were living near this place, so we drank coffee and ate kouluri from this shop every morning. Really good servise, atmosphere and taste of everything. Everybody will find kouluri for him self, from salty to very sweet.

title: Fantastic place
text: We ordered Gyros. It was delicious!!! And really good looking dish. Fair prices. Friendly and cosy servise. We recommend to try lamb meet
